name: WPB Elementor Addons
author: wpbean

sections.description:
Elementor is the number one page builder for WordPress currently available now in the market. It has a super easy user interface, anyone can design complex web pages without knowing any code.

WPB Elementor Addons can take your site to the next level by adding a number of premium quality addons with a huge number of customization options. It’s one of the Best Elementor Addons pack. All the addons are a premium quality modern design.

You can build any professional websites with this addon pack. We have elements for any type of business, corporate or personal websites. The team, services, pricing table addon allow you to integrate it for any type of business websites.

This addons pack works with any standard free or premium WordPress themes. No matter you are using a free theme, our Best Elementor Addons will always make you feel like a premium theme.

DEMO | Support | Documentation | Video Tutorials

Available Addons

  • Post Grid/Slider that displays any post types posts in a nice grid or slider.
  • Pricing Table to increases your sales.
  • Testimonials Grid/Slider can show your clients feedbacks.
  • Team Members Grid/Slider for showing all of your team members.
  • Service Box for showing your offer for your customers.
  • Fancy List can show your list items in a beautiful way.
  • Content Box Grid/Slider can present any static content with an image.
  • Logo Slider can showcase your sponsors/featured logos in a slider.
  • Counter Up can show your statics in a nice counter.
  • Video Popup that displays a video in a popup, can be used for video call to action.
  • Filterable Image Gallery to showcase your images with filtering options.
  • Content Timeline to show any type of content in a timeline. Support for image, iframe, ShortCode, icon, date etc.
  • Slider can show a slideshow of images, contents and buttons.
  • News Ticker This news ticker can scroll/slide content in a different style.
  • Videos Grid Videos Grid with title, content, and details link and self-hosted/ YouTube Videos.

Premium Addons

  • News Ticker PRO for scrolling dynamic data like posts, products, categories even a navigation menu.
  • Timeline PRO for showing the post, products, categories, gallery images in a nice timeline with lots of customization options.

Completely Customizable:

All the addons color and typography is changeable from the option. Any unnecessary addon can be disabled from the settings. All the addons are 100% mobile responsive and 100% multilanguage supported.

Support and Documentation:

Using these addons is super easy as we have details online documentation for this. If you are having any issue with these addons our expert support team members are always ready for you. Just open a support ticket on our support forum.
sections.installation:
• Install it as a regular WordPress plugin

  • Active the plugin. Make sure you have Elementor plugin installed and active before activating this plugin.

  • After installing the plugin follow our step by step online documentation for using the addons and customize your website.
sections.faq:
Does it work with the theme that I am using?

We test this plugin with so many free and premium themes. It should work with any standard WordPress themes. If you are having any issue with your theme, please open a support ticket on our forum. We will fix the issue and release an update for this plugin.

sections.reviews:
A hidden Gem in a sea of add-ons

By neabiufr on April 27, 2023

Seems like some folks had some issues a couple years ago but i had no issues at all in 2023, quite the opposite. I came across this add-on by mistake but it was meant to be. I had spent hours trying out plugins that don't advise you what the limitations of the free version are, so you have to install them to find out. How frustrating. I'm donating my time to a social project which doesn't have many resources so I have to stick to free options. I came for the timeline widget, which is awesome, and stayed for the other features too. I ended up ditching the most well known elementor addon packs because they were so limited and this did it all without the limitations. Support very fast and useful. To use videos in the timeline you just embed iframe code. Thanks!

Do not use for Elementor

By iscottjones on February 25, 2021

I wasn't going to leave this review but considering this plugin is designed specifically for Elementor I felt it necessary to do so. I'm using Elementor, obviously. I've spent three days trying to debug why when adding an entrance animation to a column or section resulted in that content not showing up at all on live pages. I've deleted sections, elements, and content one at a time to find the specific cause. Finally, I found the reasons why. It was the WPB CounterUp widget conflicting with Elementors entrance animations. I am sorely disappointed as this plugin has been made for Elementor, yet hasn't be tested thoroughly. I can only wonder what other widgets within this plugin will potentially do to a site.

Not working

By tiranaimmobiliare on October 6, 2020

Stuck on loading

Very Good

By june01 on July 26, 2020

Very nice design and the slider slider doesn't break with Arabic content like other plugins.

Great Plugin and responsive support

By alydonnelly on May 10, 2020

Love the plugin. Worked great for my website. I ran into an issue when it interacted badly with my theme, but I opened a ticket with their support and it was literally fixed in less than an hour.

Good plugin

By goodigital on March 16, 2020

It's a good plugin. This is great to can add shortcodes in Timelines widget

Top Support

By francescomatturro on March 8, 2020

I had an issue and the team has worked on it in few minutes. Recomended.

Crashed Elementor Toolbar

By zaratustra27 on March 4, 2020

I wasn't even able to try the plugin

Good plugin and perfect support

By badber on February 19, 2020

I installed this plugin because I needed to have a Timeline on a site and it had to work with Elementor. After much research I found WPB Elementor Addons which offered a free timeline. I was disappointed because after starting my work, all the dates remained in English version. I contacted support with no real hope of having a solution to the problem. But after few emails and few hours, the support had resolved the problem. Amazing ! A very good tool + fast and efficient support. Of course, we always want more. I would like to be able to display different colors between 2 events in my timeline (title and icons background) but it's already very good for a free tool. Thank you for this work

Cool plug-in, incredible support

By quodlibetarian on February 1, 2020

I was looking for plug-ins to create a post grid. There were many addons and plugins providing such a feature, but WPB Elementor Addons was the only one I found which shows meta data (category and tag) within the grid. And moreover, the dev provides really awesome supports, even when you are using it free. After I reported a bug, they patched it right away, within two hours. I don't think they could be always that fast against every bug, but, it was impressive anyway.
